# Writing CSV Files

üìù Save data in CSV format!

```python
import csv

data = [{'name': 'Hero', 'level': 10}]

with open('data.csv', 'w', newline='') as f:
    writer = csv.DictWriter(f, fieldnames=['name', 'level'])
    writer.writeheader()
    writer.writerows(data)
```

solutionCode:
import csv
import io

party = [
    {'name': 'Warrior', 'level': 10, 'hp': 150},
    {'name': 'Mage', 'level': 12, 'hp': 70}
]

output = io.StringIO()
writer = csv.DictWriter(output, fieldnames=['name', 'level', 'hp'])
writer.writeheader()
writer.writerows(party)

print(output.getvalue())
